title: This Account
body:
So this account is one that i was forced to username change, but as is probably obvious, has become borked in the process.

I have this completely random name, and am apparently level 3.

replies.body: i have pass and i complete my mission but i didnt got the night & dawn ward skin  plz fix it

Loot (such as ward skins, and emotes in particular) can sometimes take a bit of time to show up in your collection. If you give it a bit of time (24 hours or so) it may show up on it's own, if not then your best option is to submit a ticket to [Support](https://support-leagueoflegends.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) (use the "I have an Event/Clash question or issue" option) and they should be able to help.

Submit a ticket to player support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

Boards can't really help you with such account-specific questions. There is any number of things that could be going on here and without the full context that support has we can't really give you much to work with.

I'd love to do that but

http://prntscr.com/qf3b7s

So you need to work out some way you can fix it, because i sure as hell can't.
So I take it you aren't receiving the email? If not, submit an account recovery ticket instead. You will have to be logged out to do so and they will ask you to verify ownership of the account.

Also wouldn't an account recovery ticket mean that the account actually has to be linked in some form, i can't verify some magic account that doesn't exist (not to mention i'm not sure i'd be able to verify the account that this is, because if i recall the questions are baffling and extremely hard to answer)
Well assuming you know both the old and new UN of the account in question, and the answers to most of the account recovery questions, that's all you should need for them to find what the drama is.
So which UN do i submit the request under?
The current updated one. Post the old one in the notes.
Where and when did that pop up and was there a prompt on the same page to submit a ticket?
